Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: C. Lanier
Reviews.Content: This package is a great deal. Pricing separately, the body ($800) and the 18-140mm lens ($600) together are already hundreds of dollars more expensive than this entire bundle. The flash and battery are both off-brand, but considering they gave me 13 extra items, i honestly dont mind.  Pricing as a bundle($1100), for an extra $300, you get a second lens and 12 more items. The camera is amazing (my first DSLR).

Reviews.Title: A Wonderful Package!
Reviews.Author: del92126
Reviews.Content: I received my camera and accessories in a very well packaged large box. Everything that was listed arrived and a few things I ordered on the side came in. The camera is a fantastic photographic piece of equipment. I have had more fun with it, and the resolution is outstanding. I haven't used the flash accessory yet because the camera has a good one built-in to it.You won't be sorry that you purchased this package at all.

Reviews.Title: Very happy !
Reviews.Author: R. Rodger "R. Rodger"
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my choice of Nikon D5300. This package deal has everything you need and the camera is awesome!  I am still learning my way around all the features  and enjoying all of it.  The two lenses included in this package cover all my needs!  I would reccomend to anyone to buy this packaged deal, it is excellent!

Reviews.Title: Right one for us
Reviews.Author: HappyFamily
Reviews.Content: Bought as a gift for my wife and it couldn't have been better. Researched all the comparable products and this one is really the best one for our needs/wants. Highly recommend the combo packs.

Reviews.Title: As advertised
Reviews.Author: Dave Forbes
Reviews.Content: Everything was packed well and it arrived with everything advertised. It has what we needed as photographers looking to take the step past small or phone cameras. We're really enjoying the camera itself. Great features and picture quality. It can be the "next step" camera, with greater setting control, or a really big "point and shoot" camera if you like.  The Telephoto has a cool macro setting for extreme close ups.

Reviews.Title: good kit for the price
Reviews.Author: briand
Reviews.Content: This a very good camera with two very good lenses everything in the kit seems to be decent quality except for the tripod it is very flimsy all and all well worth the money
